subject: Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Beneficiary,
Your fund worth $3.5M Usd has been approved to pay you.
Kindly forward your information stated below to enable our bank
process your ATM CARD Payment immediately.
Your Full Name:
Your Full Receiving Information:
Your Cell Phone Number:
A copy Of your ID:
Again our bank have only one mode of payment (1) ATM Card Payment: An
ATM Card Will Be Charged With This Amount with $5,000 Withdrawals Per
Day
Kindly forward the above listed information to enable our bank process
your ATM CARD payment here on your name with our any delay.
Yours faithfully,
Ali Y. KOÃ‡
Director
Yapi Kredi Bank Turkey

subject: Re:  Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Ali Y. KO,

Thank you for your message. However, I would like to clarify a few things before proceeding further. 

Firstly, could you please provide more details about the fund that has been approved for me? How did this come about and what is the exact amount?

Secondly, could you please explain more about the ATM Card Payment method? How does it work and what are the terms and conditions associated with it?

Lastly, could you please confirm what information you need from me to proceed with this process?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Richard
